description: This vegan recipe is sure to be a hit with the whole family. A whole baked cauliflower encased in golden pastry topped with a creamy spiced coconut sauce.
name: Vegan curried cauliflower pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine remaining paste and milk in a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Remove pan from heat. Cook rice according to packet instructions. Drizzle pie with curry sauce and serve with coriander and rice.
